credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
dimensions:
43 x 27.8 cm (17 x 11 in.), opened
21.5 x 27.8 cm (8 1/2 x 11 in.), closed
title: M&Co Handy Reference Guide to Corporate Identity
description: In a format achieved by computer graphics, the present object, titled The M&Co Handy Reference Guide to Corporate Growth, imprinted in italicized type, is directed to potential M&Co clients. It features an organization chart of sample logos designed in a variety of typographical styles. These are accompanied within, as well as in additional boxes, by messages exhorting clients to rethink and redesign outmoded logos. A small section, centered at the bottom, contains several lines of type promoting M&Co's services in this regard; at center is You Need a New Logo, also in italicized type.
name: logo chart
